sentences.sContent: Then you could have your test automation read, parse, and use the data in this file.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then you could have your test automation read, parse, and use the data in this file.
sentences.sCn: 然后您可以让您的测试自动化读取、解析和使用该文件中的数据。

sentences.sContent: These have focused on simplifying the development, automation, and optimization of applications.
sentences.sContent_eng: These have focused on simplifying the development, automation, and optimization of applications.
sentences.sCn: 这主要集中在简化应用程序的开发、自动化和优化方面。

sentences.sContent: But its most natural target is in automation of system scripting and text processing tasks.
sentences.sContent_eng: But its most natural target is in automation of system scripting and text processing tasks.
sentences.sCn: 但是它最自然的目标在于系统脚本的自动化和本文处理任务。

过程自动化；工序自动化

words.tran: 自动的；无意识的；必然的

trans.tranOther: the use of computers and machines instead of people to do a job
